summary.span: 为启用 SOAP 的 COM+ 应用程序发布 COM 接口。

span.span: Publishes COM interfaces for SOAP-enabled COM+ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现是; 请参阅该主题有关的详细信息。The implementation of is ; see that topic for specifics. 由.NET Framework 内部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 不需要在代码中直接使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetAssemblyNameForCache (string TypeLibPath, out string CachePath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetAssemblyNameForCache(string TypeLibPath, [out] string& CachePath) cil managed
Public Sub GetAssemblyNameForCache (TypeLibPath As String, ByRef CachePath As String)
public: void GetAssemblyNameForCache(System::String ^ TypeLibPath, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % CachePath);

param.name: TypeLibPath
param.span: 包含类型库的文件的路径。

span.span: The path for the file that contains the typelib.

param.name: CachePath
param.span: 此方法返回时，此参数包含 SoapCache 目录中的代理程序集的完整路径。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the full path of the proxy assembly in the SoapCache directory.

summary.span: 返回 SoapCache 目录中生成的强名称签名程序集的完整路径。

span.span: Returns the full path for a strong-named signed generated assembly in the SoapCache directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于非托管 COM + 组件以通过 SOAP 终结点的.NET 远程处理发布，代理需要生成可向.NET Framework 提供的非托管的组件。For an unmanaged COM+ component to be published through .NET remoting as a SOAP endpoint, a proxy needs to be generated to make the unmanaged components available to the .NET Framework. 这可通过以编程方式执行与类型库导入程序 (Tlbimp.exe) 相同的步骤[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]工具，用于将非托管的 COM + 类型库转换为代理元数据程序集。This is done by programmatically performing the same steps as Type Library Importer (Tlbimp.exe), the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] tool that is used to convert unmanaged COM+ type libraries to proxy metadata assemblies. 但是，对于通过 SOAP 成功的客户端激活，客户端和服务器计算机必须共享相同的强名称签名的元数据代理服务器。For client activation over SOAP to succeed, however, client and server machines must share the same strong-named signed metadata proxies. 因此，托管的代理程序集生成的非托管的 COM + 组件时强名称密钥还生成和用于对代理程序集进行签名。For this reason, when a managed proxy assembly is generated for an unmanaged COM+ component, a strong name key is also generated and used to sign the proxy assembly.

exception.span: 为 。

span.span: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.

exception.span: 在字符串中间包含一个冒号 (:)。

span.span: contains a colon (:) in the middle of the string.

summary.span: 处理客户端类型库，在客户端上创建配置文件。

span.span: Processes a client type library, creating a configuration file on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在客户端代理导入用于生成远程处理配置文件。This method is used on a client proxy import to generate a remoting configuration file. 在实现中，如果`Mode`参数为"wellknownobject"或空字符串 ("")，则假定的已知对象;否则，将假定客户端激活。In the implementation, if the `Mode` parameter is either "wellknownobject" or an empty string (""), a well-known object is assumed; otherwise, client activation is assumed. 建议而不是使用。It is recommended that be used instead of .
